conbody.p: GraphQL is a query language that allows API consumers to write queries to get the exact data they need from a single request to a single endpoint. GraphQL provides a detailed and easy-to-understand description of the data in your API, making it easier to evolve APIs over time. GraphQL queries get many resources in a single request and always return predictable results. Therefore, GraphQL significantly improves the efficiency and performance of API calls.
To learn more about GraphQL, you can refer to GraphQL documentation: Introduction to GraphQL.
